A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: In short this movie sucks. This was not Luke Skywalker. The old characters I like were not respected. The new ones that were introduced great in force awakens were crapped on in this movie. They were all out of character. I have no desire to watch episode 9 because of this movie. Also because of this movie I have no desire to watch the force awakens again. Maybe Disney learns from this and will do other trilogy's right. Maybe keeping a director for 3 movies. That might help. Can't bring back dead characters. Too late on that. Gosh they ruined Luke Skywalker in this. I mark this trilogy as NOT CANNON.
